trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Guidingway has a request that only an adventurer such as yourself could fulfill.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_TODO_00<tab>Defeat a daphnia and obtain its remains.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the daphnia's remains to Guidingway.

TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_000<tab>Ah, there you are. Do you have a moment? While going over the resources sent by our collaborators, I stumbled upon a rather curious morsel of information that wants for verification.

TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_001<tab>Is it true that you procure crafting materials from other living creatures, and thereafter use them to craft <var 1A 02 /var>without<var 1A 01 /var> using creation magicks?
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_002<tab>Incredible! I'd like to try my hand at it, but first I'll require materials to craft with...

TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_003<tab>Considering what resources are here in Mare Lamentorum, I thought a daphnia would be the perfect specimen to harvest material from, but I am hardly a hunter.

TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_004<tab>But that's where you come in! Being Hydaelyn's champion and all, I have no doubt you can handle a daphnia or two. Might I trouble you to bring one back for study?
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_005<tab>Wonderful! The daphnia inhabit the area around Lovingway's Darlings, if you're looking for a place to start. Happy hunting!
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_006<tab>You should have no trouble finding a daphnia near Lovingway's Darlings.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_010<tab>Welcome back. I take it you have a daphnia for me? Or what's left of one, I suppose.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_011<tab>Oh, goodness! Apologies, I've never seen one this close before.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_012<tab>Yes... As I thought, the skin is quite elastic.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_013<tab>With this, it should prove no trouble at all to produce clothing for people of all sizes!
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_A1_000_001<tab>Sounds quite comfortable!
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_A1_000_002<tab>Wouldn't clothes from that be a little too...translucent?
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_A1_000_003<tab>Are you sure clothes made from that are a good idea?
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_014<tab>I had hoped you would approve! We'll make the finest garb for you and your kind.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_015<tab>Now that you mention it... We'll have to come up with a rigorous dye treatment to ensure the cloth isn't too revealing.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_016<tab>What's the matter? The resulting garments will be highly practical, not to mention comfortable.
TEXT_AKTKZE011_04250_GUIDINGWAY_000_017<tab>In any case, you've been a great help. It's not much, but I'd like you to have this.
